20101207160152.667|20101207160154.333|CCO|WHAT THEY DID WAS, THEY COMBINED
20101207160154.333|20101207160156.000|CCO|DATA FROM EIGHT STUDIES TO LOOK 
20101207160156.000|20101207160157.667|CCO|AT WHETHER ASPIRIN PREVENTS 
20101207160157.667|20101207160159.333|CCO|HEART DISEASE.
20101207160159.333|20101207160201.000|CCO|AND THEY SAID, IS THERE 
20101207160201.000|20101207160204.333|CCO|SOMETHING WE CAN LOOK AT IN 
20101207160204.333|20101207160207.667|CCO|TERMS OF CANCER PREVENTION?
20101207160207.667|20101207160211.000|CCO|WHEN THEY COMBINED THE DATA FROM
20101207160211.000|20101207160212.250|CCO|THE STUDIES, HALF OF THE PEOPLE 
20101207160212.250|20101207160213.500|CCO|HAD BEEN ASSIGNED TO TAKE 
20101207160213.500|20101207160214.750|CCO|ASPIRIN AND HALF NOT.

20101207160216.000|20101207160217.250|CCO|ASPIRIN, HAD A 20% REDUCTION IN 
20101207160217.250|20101207160218.500|CCO|RISK OF DYING FROM CANCER.

20101207160643.000|20101207160644.000|CCO|THIS IS WHAT THE VACCINE IS 
20101207160644.000|20101207160645.000|CCO|TRYING TO PREVENT.
20101207160645.000|20101207160646.000|CCO|THIS 6-YEAR-OLD BOY CAME IN WITH
20101207160646.000|20101207160647.000|CCO|A STIFF NECK AND HIGH FEVER, 
20101207160647.000|20101207160648.000|CCO|TYPICAL SIGNS OF MENINGITIS.
20101207160648.000|20101207160649.000|CCO|WITH ANTIBIOTICS IN SHORT
